sect2.title: BKView Module
sect2.subtitle: BitKeeper repository viewer. Admin->Bkview.
sect2.para: Xaraya development used to take place with BitKeeper software. Due to several reasons development is now performed in monotone.
This module permits viewing of a BitKeeper repository. If you use BitKeeper, this module will be useful for viewing items. If you do not use BitKeeper, this module will be of little use.

listitem.para: Repository name: Enter the name of the repository as you want it displayed on the site.
Path: Enter the complete path to the BitKeeper repository.
